column2: BRIEF-Cno Financial Group Announces Increase To Quarterly Dividend May 8 (Reuters) - CNO Financial Group Inc: * CNO FINANCIAL GROUP ANNOUNCES INCREASE TO QUARTERLY DIVIDEND AND RESULTS OF ANNUAL SHAREHOLDERS MEETING * CNO FINANCIAL GROUP INC - APPROVED A $0.01 PER SHARE INCREASE IN ITS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND * CNO FINANCIAL GROUP INC - DECLARED A QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.12 PER SHARE ON COMPANYâ€™S COMMON SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Cno Financial Group Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.15 May 5 (Reuters) - CNO Financial Group Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $0.40 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * BOOK VALUE PER COMMON SHARE WAS $26.22 AT MARCH 31, 2020 COMPARED TO $31.58 AT DECEMBER 31, 2019 * EXPECT TO EFFECTIVELY MANAGE NEAR-TERM DISRUPTION FROM COVID-19 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-CNO Financial Group Reports Q4 Operating Earnings Per Share Of $0.52 Feb 11 (Reuters) - CNO Financial Group Inc: * CNO FINANCIAL GROUP REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2019 RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $0.46 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * AT DECEMBER 31, 2019, BOOK VALUE PER COMMON SHARE WAS $31.58, UP 52% FROM $20.78 AT DECEMBER 31, 2018 * CNO FINANCIAL GROUP - QTRLY ANNUITY COLLECTED PREMIUMS WERE DOWN 9% FROM 4Q18, REFLECTING PRICING DISCIPLINE AND A DIFFICULT COMPARABLE FROM PRIOR YEAR * CNO FINANCIAL GROUP - AT DECEMBER 31, 2019, BOOK VALUE PER DILUTED SHARE, EXCLUDING ACCUMULATED OTHER COMPREHENSIVE INCOME (2), WAS $22.09, UP 13% * QTRLY TOTAL FIRST-YEAR COLLECTED PREMIUMS FROM SEGMENTS $408.6 MILLION VERSUS $435.3 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-CNO Financial Group Inc Files For Potential Mixed Shelf Offering May 10 (Reuters) - CNO Financial Group Inc: * CNO FINANCIAL GROUP INC FILES FOR POTENTIAL MIXED SHELF OFFERING; SIZE NOT DISCLOSED- SEC FILING Source text: (bit.ly/2jP8lai) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-CNO Financial Group Appoints Daniel Maurer As Chairman Of The Board May 9 (Reuters) - CNO Financial Group Inc: * CNO FINANCIAL GROUP NAMES NEW CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD AND ANNOUNCES INCREASE TO QUARTERLY DIVIDEND AND RESULTS OF ANNUAL SHAREHOLDERS MEETING * DECLARED A QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.10 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-CNO Financial Group Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.50 April 25 (Reuters) - CNO Financial Group Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.43 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
